page.title: 15Recreation-Pastimes.
page.content: The most popular pastime in Tumble is reading and ninety per cent of the population go regularly to the Library to exchange books. Tying with reading is watching television, most householders have two television sets with many also having video recorders either bought or rented. Gardening is also very popular since 95% of the houses have a garden or lawn. The majority of the residents have a vegetable garden in which they grow their own produce. Going to the three Social Clubs is the fourth most popular pastime, either for a drink and a chat or to attend the bingo sessions and discos. For the female population knitting and sewing is very popular, whilst the men prefer to do odd jobs around the house.
